name: Webhook (Generic)
description: Generic HTTP webhook endpoint. Send JSON payloads to trigger Agent Zero and receive responses.

webhook_path.label: Webhook Path
webhook_path.description: URL path for the webhook endpoint (e.g. /webhook/agent)

auth_token.label: Auth Token
auth_token.description: Bearer token required in requests. Leave empty to disable auth.

response_mode.label: Response Mode
response_mode.description: sync = wait for response, async = return immediately with task ID
